about_the_game:
Feisty Fauna is a ridiculously cute survivors-like / bullet heaven with a storyline, where you're a mom rescuing her kidnapped chicks. You'll have to survive as you hunt other cute animals in this eat-or-be-eaten animal world. Meet other cute, diverse characters and learn their backstories and motivations!

Playable characters

Peppermint, a chicken mom who wants to rescue her kidnapped chicks:


Vanilla, a passionate cat who aspires to be a cat ninja:


Discover and unlock more playable characters as you progress in the game!

Gameplay

Meet and chat with other cute, diverse creatures in the farm before heading out into the world:


Avoid telegraphed attacks from cute creatures, while you kill them with your own skills and complete quest objectives:


Choose your own path in the campaign, which leads to differences in the storyline:


Explore various biomes, and experience special events:


Unlock various playable characters, each with their own unique skills:


Play with friends locally (up to 4 players) or with Steam Remote Play together:

Game features

  • An adorable art style, where even the most powerful enemy makes you want to hug it
  • A engaging story in campaign mode, with a diverse representation of characters
  • Branching paths in the campaign, for you to decide how to proceed
  • Twitch integration for streamers, so your viewers can join in the fun
  • Local co-op and Steam Remote Play Together for split-screen mayhem
  • Fully-customizable difficulty, so the game can be as easy/hard as you like
  • A menagerie of animals you can summon via skills, who will aid you
  • Passive and aggressive (maybe some passive-aggressive) creatures that inhabit the world
  • Never run out of creatures to hunt in an endless procedurally-generated world

Feisty Fauna is in active development, and we are adding new features constantly! Wishlist today to follow our progress! We are also always happy to hear your thoughts and suggestions 😄
detailed_description:
Halloween story available now



To celebrate the spooky month of October, we have added a side storyline for Halloween, where Peppermint visits the Haunted Hinterlands.



Peppermint will have to survive the spooky inhabitants of Haunted Hinterlands in order to uncover the mystery of the portal that opened in her farm.

The Halloween story is available in our campaign / story-mode, and also in the classic mode (without a story). Try it out today and let us know what you think!


Playtest available till middle of September



As part of Feedback Quest 7, we have made our Playtest available again!

This playtest will be available until the middle of September, so do try it out and let us know what you think!

We have revamped Peppermint's skills, so now you can have skill combos! For example, egg-splode + cotton candy gives you the following combination:



There are many different combinations you can try out in our playtest! We have also lifted the max level limit, so you can level an unlimited number of times in the playtest, just like you would in the full game.

In addition, we have added a minigame that you can try out, through the Play->Minigame option from the main menu. In the mini-game, you control a squirrel named Caramel who is helping Chestnut save animals:



To join the playtest, click "Request Access" on our store page. You'll instantly receive access and be able to download and play in the playtest!


Playtest available till end of March



As part of Feedback Quest 6, we have made our Playtest available again!

This playtest will be available until the end of March, so do try it out and let us know what you think!

There are 3 campaign levels available in the playtest, which completes the first story beat of the campaign. Besides Peppermint and Vanilla, Honey the loving dog is also available as a playable character in the campaign (if you unlock her).

During the game (outside of the farm), you can now change the camera angle! To do so, you can use the right joystick on the gamepad, or right-click and drag the mouse. The camera angle is not currently saved across levels.

To join the playtest, click "Request Access" on our store page. You'll instantly receive access and be able to download and play in the playtest!


Lunar New Year event available



To celebrate the Year of the Dragon, we have added a side storyline for the Lunar New Year, where Peppermint visits Tian Ting.



Peppermint will have to survive a menagerie of animals in Tian Ting in order to restore the natural zodiac cycle.

The Lunar Near Year story is available in our campaign / story-mode, and also in the classic mode (without a story). Try it out today and let us know what you think!
